name: Clutch Lever
description: A mechanism uses the rider's pull on the clutch lever to lift the pressure plate against its spring pressure, separating the friction and steel plates.

name: Clutchplate
description: The drive plate is the interface between the clutch basket and the pressure plate. The driven plate is the interface between the pressure plate and the clutch hub.

name: Disk Brake
description: Hydraulic discs feature a closed system of hoses and reservoirs containing special hydraulic fluid to operate the brakes.

name: Suspension
description: Bike suspension is the system, or systems, used to suspend the rider and bike in order to insulate them from the roughness of the terrain.
